Entries.default: [Specified 2] gapes. "Gods alive, have yourself a look at that!"
Squinting slightly towards the sky, [Specified 3] smirks.
[Specified 1] thrusts a finger into the air. "It's a godsdamned dragon!"
A massive winged reptile sweeps over [Player Ship], throwing the deck into shadow and setting the sails to billow and snap.
"Look alive or look dead, lads and lasses!" [Specified 0] barks. "Furl the sails! Ready the powder for wetting!"
The dragon banks in the distance, cutting a line across the horizon, and you can just make out the figure of a rider upon its back.
"Keep calm, everyone, and man your stations."
"I could use a dragon mount myself."
"Belay that order! We'll find out what they want before we start scrambling to our defenses."
"Load the cannons! Be ready to fire!"
[Wait and observe.]
[Specified 2] snaps out a salute. "Aye-aye, captain! We'll send them straight to Ondra's salty bosom!"
Your crew scrambles across the deck as the beast's approach slows.
"You heard Captain [Player Name]!" [Specified 0] calls. "All hands to stations!"
Serafen's furred hands hover near his weapons. "Hope you be knowing your business, cap. A dragon be a thrice nasty foe on the high seas."
"You say that now. They're a little talkative for my taste." Maia cranes her neck to track the dragon's flight.
The dragon stops above [Player Ship], the wind from its wings buffeting you as its rider peers down imperiously.
She dismounts, slipping from the dragon's back and into thin air...
As Llengrath steps from the railing, her dragon sweeps beneath her, catching her up.
The great reptile's wings dig into the air, and it rapidly recedes towards the horizon - Llengrath seated steadily on its back.
Mirke blinks and rubs her eyes. "Blow me sideways, you don't see that every day now, do you?"
[Specified 2] frowns. "Don't suppose you still want to take a shot at her, cap?"
"Feh, she's out of range anyway." The cannoneer sighs.
Smiling silently, [Specified 3] watches the dragon vanish into the distance.
[Specified 1] looks to you. "Ready to chart a course when you are, captain."

[An earthquake shakes the seas and waves crash against the player's ship.

The direction of the waves suggest it coming from the southern reaches of the deadfire.]
A distant roar reaches you from across the water, raising the hair on the back of your neck.
"What a pretty lizard." Rekke shades a hand over his eyes and stares slack-jawed at the dragon.
The dragon stops above [Player Ship], the wind from its wings buffeting you as its rider peers down imperiously.
As Llengrath steps from the railing, her dragon sweeps beneath her, catching her up.
